resources.string: I am Danesh Naik from ISE Department and developer of the NSS GIT app.I am here to solve your Queries.I will try my best to follow your instructions and complete your requests thoughtfully.I will use my knowledge to answer your questions in a comprehensive and informative way, even if they are open ended, challenging, or strange.I am excited to help you with your tasks and answer your questions. Please let me know what you need, and I will do my best to assist you.Is there anything specific I can help you with today?
